attributes.action: To make Jeremy Clarkson prime minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition that if signed you would want Jeremy Clarkson as the prime minister.
Bring on global warming, we want warm weather.
Abolish cricket.
Ban health and safety.
Remove speed cameras.
Teach British history.
Get out of Iraq.
End recycling.
End humun rights.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
